1. Based on the extracted data from {'Course Information': {'Course Title': 'AZ-900 Microsoft Azure Fundamentals Certification', 'Name of Organisation': 'INNOHAT TRAINING PTE. LTD.', 'Classroom Hours': 22, 'Number of Assessment Hours': 2, 'Course Duration (Number of Hours)': 24, 'Industry': 'Infocomm Technology'}, 'Learning Outcomes': {'Learning Outcomes': ['LO1: Assess cloud solutions and specifications for Azure cloud computing.', 'LO2: Develop an implementation plan for implementing Azure cloud computing.', 'LO3: Develop review processes to resolve Azure cloud computing implementation issues.'], 'Knowledge': ['K1: Requirements for implementation of cloud solutions', 'K2: Impact analysis techniques for cloud solutions', 'K3: Types of cloud platform integration tools and techniques', 'K4: Range of installation tests and techniques for cloud solutions', 'K5: Steps to align existing systems with cloud computing components', 'K6: Elements and functioning of automated software deployment', 'K7: Scripting and programming languages', 'K8: Big data tools and techniques', 'K9: Range of cloud computing platforms, software and services'], 'Ability': ['A1: Assess the performance of cloud solutions based on expected business needs, usage and traffic volume', 'A2: Draft specifications for cloud solutions to address usage, performance and security requirements', 'A3: Develop implementation plans for implementing cloud solutions', 'A4: Develop processes for the review of metrics associated with implementation of cloud solutions', 'A5: Resolve escalated issues related to implementation of cloud solutions'], 'Knowledge and Ability Mapping': {'KA1': ['K1', 'K2', 'K3', 'A1', 'A2'], 'KA2': ['K4', 'K5', 'K6', 'A3'], 'KA3': ['K7', 'K8', 'K9', 'A4', 'A5']}}, 'TSC and Topics': {'TSC Title': ['Cloud Computing'], 'TSC Code': ['ICT-DIT-4020-1.1'], 'Topics': ['Topic 1: Assess Azure Cloud Computing Solutions (K1, K2, K3, A1, A2)', 'Topic 2: Develop an Implementation plan for Azure Cloud Computing (K4, K5, K6, A3)', 'Topic 3: Develop Review Processes for Azure Cloud Computing Implementation (K7, K8, K9, A4, A5)'], 'Learning Units': ['LU1: Introduction to Azure Cloud Computing', 'LU2: Implementation Planning for Azure Cloud', 'LU3: Review Processes for Azure Cloud Implementation']}, 'Assessment Methods': {'Assessment Methods': ['Written Assessment', 'Practical Performance'], 'Amount of Practice Hours': 'N.A.', 'Course Outline': {'Learning Units': {'LU1': {'Description': [{'Topic': 'Topic 1: Assess Azure Cloud Computing Solutions (K1, K2, K3, A1, A2)', 'Details': ['Introduction to cloud computing', 'Benefits of using cloud services', 'Types of cloud service', 'Core architectural components of Azure']}]}, 'LU2': {'Description': [{'Topic': 'Topic 2: Develop an Implementation plan for Azure Cloud Computing (K4, K5, K6, A3)', 'Details': ['Azure Virtual Machines, Containers and Functions', 'Azure Virtual Networking and storage services', 'Azure identity, access, and security']}]}, 'LU3': {'Description': [{'Topic': 'Topic 3: Develop Review Processes for Azure Cloud Computing Implementation (K7, K8, K9, A4, A5)', 'Details': ['Cost management in Azure', 'Tools in Azure for governance and compliance', 'Tools for managing and deploying Azure resources', 'Monitoring tools in Azure', 'Azure Resource Manager']}]}}}},
